To apply for our courses, please visit our website and fill out the online application form. You'll need to provide your educational background and choose your desired course. After submission, our admissions team will review your application and contact you for further steps.

Our courses have flexible start dates throughout the year. Most courses are offered in morning (9 AM - 1 PM) and evening (6 PM - 10 PM) batches to accommodate different schedules. Please check our website for the most up-to-date schedule information.

Prerequisites vary by course. For beginner courses like Intro to Programming, no prior experience is needed. For advanced courses, basic programming knowledge or completion of prerequisite courses may be required. Check the specific course page for detailed requirements.

Our faculty consists of experienced professionals and academics in their respective fields. Each instructor has several years of industry or research experience. You can find detailed profiles of our faculty members on our website.
Yes, upon successful completion of the course, you will receive a certificate of completion. Our certificates are recognized by many industry partners and can be a valuable addition to your resume.

We offer career support and placement assistance to our students. This includes resume workshops, mock interviews, and connections with our industry partners for internship and job opportunities. However, please note that while we assist in the process, job placement is not guaranteed.

Course fees vary depending on the program. We offer various payment plans and options for financial aid. Limited scholarships are also available based on merit and need. Please contact our financial aid office for detailed information on fees and funding options for your specific situation.
